text: Hey John, we heard you started a new job at Bright Horizons Accounting! How's it going? And how's life treating you otherwise? We miss your updates!
Reminder: Aunt Clara's birthday Zoom call is this Saturday at 7 PM. Don't forget to join!
Has anyone heard from John lately? I hope he's doing well with all the changes happening.
John, your cousin Lisa just got engaged! We're all so excited for her.
Can't wait to see everyone on the call this weekend. It's been too long!
Does anyone have a good book recommendation? I need something new to read.
John, we're all proud of you for taking on the new job. You're going to be great!
Looking forward to the family update, John. Your art is always a highlight!
